item.title: Tesla Stock Sees 28% Slide In Retail Chatter Over Past Week Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
item.description: Tesla is slated to report its second quarter (Q2) earnings after the closing bell on Wednesday, July 23.

item.title: Netflix Dips Despite Upbeat Earnings But Stock Get’s Strong Backing From Retail Investors
item.description: Retail investor engagement surged on Stocktwits, with messages jumping over 900% in 24 hours following the upbeat Q2 earnings.

item.title: BofA’s Price Target Hike On Dell Stock Makes Retail Believe There’s ‘Opportunity’

item.title: Invesco, Vistra, Dell, Coinbase Trend In Midday Trade: S&P 500 Hits Record High
item.description: Major companies among the top gainers on the S&P 500 include Abbott Laboratories, Tesla, Coinbase, and Constellation Energy.
